question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. stove
B. microwave
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The stove is positioned further back in the kitchen area, behind the microwave, and is closer to the far wall, making it clearly further from the camera than the microwave which is on a counter closer to the foreground.
